short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TiWallet Ethereum is a HD layered deterministic hardware wallet conforming to the Ethereum standards for the transaction.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TiWallet Ethereum is a HD layered deterministic hardware wallet conforming to Ethereum standards. It is a standard USB device and can be used to send and receive tokens, the transaction data and signature are generated from the hardware security chip, and a software tool is provided for the management of the hardware wallet, such as generation, import, destroy, etc.
